name: StarTech ST10000SPEX 10 Gb/s Ethernet PCIe x4 Network Adapter
Features: [Add a 10 Gigabit Ethernet port (10 Gbps) to a client, server or workstation through a PCI Express x4 (or higher) slot, 1 Port PCI Express 10 Gigabit Ethernet Network Card, PCIe x4 10Gb NIC, 802.3an 10GBASE-T NIC, 10Gbps Ethernet Adapter, Configured with standard profile bracket, low profile/half-height bracket included]
